lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I want to aid in someone's future success.
lender.occupational_info: I audit large corporation's IT systems to make sure they are compliant with public regulations.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and want to help bless those who only need a chance and a little hope, to build a better future.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large Healthcare technology firm. I help my company create better services/products, and improve healthcare for millions of people.

lender.name: Mandy
lender.loan_because: it is important to support women around the globe and help to provide opportunities for these women to live self-determined lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a freelance writer and nonprofit consultant.

lender.name: Kip
lender.loan_because: I love the entrepreneurial spirit, and I want to do what I can to encourage it in others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a success coach. I meet with my clients weekly and hold them accountable for the commitments they make to succeed in their own businesses and balance their lives.

lender.name: Kari
lender.loan_because: it's a gift to share the blessings I've been given with others
lender.occupational_info: For over 20 years I have had my own business helping families & individuals sell & buy homes and investment properties.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of a movement for positive change! Our actions create ripples across time and space that we can scarcely imagine.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: Who else will?
lender.occupational_info: High school student currently.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: in the words of philosopher William James, "The community stagnates without the impulse of the individual. The impulse dies away without the sympathy of the community. "

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: it is rewarding to look at other people's life and see that you were able to make a difference. Be a doer and not a talker!
lender.occupational_info: I deal with a lots of people and it is a big challenge everyday. We purchase building (150 units and bigger). Some of these buildings we rent to other people, other we do some work and sell and others will become part of a real estate investment trust. Like you, I am the founder and it is a big responsability to run your own business, whatever you do, congratulations! You are an entrepreneur and I am happy to help.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I thought it would be a nice thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I make machines that make paper.

lender.name: Charles Lough
lender.loan_because: People helping people helping themselves.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: it gives others the opportunity to make change.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of very sick people in a local hospital.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I am rich and have money.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of the poor at a public hospital, especially those with HIV. I also do research to find better ways to make people healthy.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great way for individuals to be investors AND caring human beings at the same time. Jesus would do it!
lender.occupational_info: Assisting people with disabilities to gain the most experience and enjoyment of life.

lender.name: Martin & Ragnhild
lender.loan_because: Opportunities in life are being very unfairly distributed over the world. Micro credit gives people opportunities that wouldn't have been there otherwise.

lender.name: Scott and Amy
lender.loan_because: We agree with a smart man who has said that "intelligence, ability and dreams are evenly distributed across all of humanity...but resources and opportunity are not." This is a small way in which we can help that opportunity become more evenly distributed.
lender.occupational_info: "You make a living by what you get...you make a life by what you give."

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I want to help out others . This way I know exactly where my money ends up.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a welfare department in Holland

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I love helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find jobs.

lender.name: Jade
lender.loan_because: I think that there couldn't be a better gift than provide jobs and business to countries where they need this most.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a wonderful skin care company - our products are undoubtedly the best in the market, and I work in a fantastic team of people Marketing the products in Australia.

lender.name: John & Allison
lender.loan_because: I remember what it was like to come up with the funds to start my own part time business.

lender.name: Moore Family
lender.loan_because: It is such a great way to see the impact your money has in someones life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Mother to 2 boys 6 and 3 1/2 years. I am hoping to raise responsible men who will give back to the world.

lender.name: Ted
lender.loan_because: I have grandchildren who I want to live in a better world than I will be able to leave for them.
lender.occupational_info: Small business accounting and income tax preparation.

lender.name: joe zink
lender.occupational_info: dairy farmer

lender.name: Wilko
lender.loan_because: I want to help a little bit in changing the world for the better
lender.occupational_info: Making the perfect match between people and organisations in their personal and business goals

lender.name: Cornelis
lender.loan_because: I would like to help others because i like to give back...
lender.occupational_info: I am doing business on the internet for many years now.

lender.name: Kaisa
lender.loan_because: I want to support spirited people who do not give up under difficult circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: Running/ coordinating different projects within a bank.

lender.name: Rosita
lender.loan_because: It just take a little help to make a big difference to those in need. My contribution returns to me but leaves a huge impact for those I lend to. This is the best way you can help anyone.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy my work. This is a great job! Making couples dreams come through.

lender.name: iamoneworld
lender.loan_because: if we realize we are all connected, one, it is much easier to share your resources.
lender.occupational_info: iamoneworld is a project about sharing culture in unity while driving around the world in a solar powered vehicle :-) The project is mainly funded by crowd funding. For more info, check the website.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: Money is hard to come by.

lender.name: Grazyna
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Zooky
lender.loan_because:
I see so many people here with good ideas and creativity to create opportunities for themselves and the people around them. The only thing they need to forfill their plans is money.
Money is not spread equally. For $ 25,- I can buy food for only a few days, but in other parts of the world this money is worth a lot more!
It's the idea that a relatively little investment form my side can make a lot of difference for somebody else.
What I like is: after the money is payed back it can be invested again in another great idea.
lender.occupational_info:
As a copywriter I create texts for advertisements, promotional brochures or other public relations outlets such as websites.
Besides that I play guitar and djembe (percussion)

lender.name: Maaike
lender.loan_because: it works!
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for the website , magazine, and communicationplans for the dutch association of city managers.

lender.name: Elise
lender.occupation: I am studying for art therapy in the Netherlands

lender.name: Rasmus
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference, directly, to someone where I can see the result of my investments and not an obscure number of "this and that built" from a huge organisation. Also, it requires so little to do so much, for people across the world who has almost nothing.

lender.name: marjolijn
lender.loan_because: Because I want to make the people's life a little bit better.
lender.occupational_info: I work at the Formido in Holland. Formido is the same as Sears in the US.

lender.name: Marcel & Marianne
lender.loan_because: just do so...

lender.name: Thessa
lender.loan_because: It is a precious thing to make a difference in someone's life

lender.name: noémie
lender.loan_because: I think it's a wonderfull way to help people around the world help themselves
lender.occupational_info: mother of 2 boys : michael and dylan singer

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I believe in a good laon.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who are addictet and homeless. I love my work, its hard work but we have a lot off fun too. I believe in a good loan. XXX Nancy..

lender.name: Lauren
lender.occupational_info: Mastering charades whilst talking to non-English speakers, mostly from the Asia-Pacific region. Planning programs that facilitate trade and investment globally.

lender.name: Ethan
lender.loan_because: everyone should
lender.occupational_info: I respond to emergencies and do my best to make a bad situation better, my second job is taking care of aquariums in my area and making sure they are healthy

lender.name: Scott and Ian
lender.loan_because: it's an interesting idea that just may work.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to help others be successful. I have traveled around the world and seen poverty first hand. I am inspired by these entrepreneurs who want to make a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Human Resources Department for a home building company. I help employees with their insurance, benefits, and career development needs.

lender.name: Ana
lender.loan_because: I know how it feels to need help and to get it from some great people so now it's my turn to give back as much as I can

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: It's good to help people to start their own business.
lender.occupational_info: Social worker who works with former street youth.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to find happiness and success through their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I design magazines, brochures and web sites for local and national companies in the United States.

lender.name: Neta
lender.loan_because: I hope to inspire others to do the same.

lender.name: Mishka
lender.loan_because: I Can

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to see I'm making a difference to someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a journalist and write newspaper and magazine articles mostly about new medicines, health, etc. I also run a natural health practice at a group practice clinic.

lender.name: Matthias
lender.loan_because: It warms the heart that so many people out there are still committed to helping make the world a better place. The help they receive from us, shows that the world has not yet run dry despite our competitive society, which is riddled with so many social problems. It is this that makes the lives of the disadvantaged tolerable and peace possible.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: Through giving you make the cosmos ows you. So give and share and make a better world. Love is the all binding force
lender.occupational_info: I help people who have troubles and coach them etc.

lender.name: Lara
lender.loan_because: I want other people to have the same chances I have.
lender.occupational_info: Im studying on an university in my country.

lender.name: Anca
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance and I have a chance to give that help to people who need it.

lender.name: Jamain Brigitha
lender.occupation: Director and Curator Dream Amsterdam Foundation
lender.loan_because: I know how important it is that people support you in realizing your dreams. Kiva helps people to realize their dreams. At the same time Kiva gives people the chance to achieve more independence and a better quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: I work under the name of "Associatives - imaginative thinkers" as a photographer, visual artist, curator and concept-developer on various international art and cultural projects. I'm the founder and director of Dream Amsterdam Foundation, and curator of art manifestation DREAM AMSTERDAM, which yearly gives a renowned international artist the opportunity to create large scale site-specific art projects in the city of Amsterdam.

lender.name: Janna
lender.loan_because: I like helping people.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a nurse who goes to someone in their own house to help them with things like medication.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: giving a little bit can help someone in more ways than I can imagine. In turn, that person may help someone else. And so on...
lender.occupational_info: I teach college age students how to communicate!

lender.name: johanna
lender.loan_because: I think this is a brilliant concept and want to be part of it.
lender.occupational_info: I teach yoga positions, breathing exercises and meditation.

lender.name: Yvo
lender.loan_because: These people have little money compare to us. So if we can help them with giving a small amount we should do that.

lender.name: Joanna and Ton
lender.loan_because: We want to help people "personally". To make our dream of a better world come true...
lender.occupational_info:
Joanna worked as a pastor in hospitals and facilities for disabled people and counselled people in a home-practise. In 2005 she was diagnosed with MS so she can't work anymore but wants to stay in touch with people as much as possible...
Ton worked as an inspector and acoountmanager for a rather big bankorganisation. He retired a couple of years ago.

lender.name: robin
lender.loan_because: want a better life for all

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: I am partially unable to work and I know how important it is to earn a living. In developing countries there is no social security. Therefor I want to help people to start up or to continue their business.
lender.occupational_info: At this moment I am changing my direction. I have been office manager/secretary for many years, but in my heart I want to be a writer and journalist. I am changing my occupation now. I work for a local newspaper and I also write about mental health issues.

lender.name: Wim de Visser
lender.loan_because: I worked many times in West Africa for my former employer Vlisco (Netherlands), a leading Textile Company in fashion in Africa. From the beginning I was impressed how people manage their lives overthere and I want to support them whenever I can.
lender.occupational_info: Did install networks, software and computers for the offices of the Vlisco Company (Netherlands) in Africa. Everytime I returned home I was more humble than the time before

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: It feels good

lender.name: Carolien
lender.loan_because: I want to help people that want to make a better life for themselves

lender.name: Wessel
lender.loan_because: I just like it. in The Netherlands we are quite wealthy.. But in other countries they aren't. When people like it to found there own business
lender.occupational_info: I'm going to school.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: it gives the greatest feeling for both partners. And THAT is the greatest feeling what I can get.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at the INHolland Academy. I'm a junior in Media & entertainment Management. I'm learning to create and manage businessevents.

lender.name: Bency
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it so easy to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: online travel services

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: it's a personal, transparent and constructive way to help your fellow man across the world!

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I have been given a lot, I just love to give back
lender.occupational_info: Management development and cultural change programs

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: Capitalism is better than welfare. Ownership places a higher value on things
lender.occupational_info: Software developer

lender.loan_because: i want to maximize the value of my money
lender.occupational_info: i am currently studying mathematics in leiden, the netherlands

lender.name: The Reed Family
lender.occupational_info: teacher

lender.name: thelionflo
lender.loan_because:
I need to do my good deed for the day.
:)
lender.occupational_info: i shoot happy couples.

lender.name: Larissa
lender.loan_because: I don't have much money right now. But I have enough to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I study how people's understanding of speech is influenced by their ability to read.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: My sister and her family gave me a cool gift certificate
lender.occupational_info: I help to contain public safety risks.

lender.name: Ming
lender.loan_because: this is a great way to help people around the world. They can get started and become more independent. This will encourage others to do so too ... to make a difference that counts.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: This organization allows me to share my blessings - and know that I can make a difference for someone so far away.
lender.occupational_info: I've worked in the banking industry for 31 years. Currently, I manage ATM projects.

lender.name: Ineke
lender.loan_because: if i were in their position, i'd feel empowered by the knowledge that there are people who care and lend a helping hand.

lender.name: Parker
lender.loan_because: I can help someone even though I am away at college! Its a great opportunity to impact the lives of people while helping the economy.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently attending Brigham Young University as a student.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: Because I can.
lender.occupational_info: Retail manager

lender.name: Marianne
lender.loan_because: Lending money to people to enable them to realise their dreams is much more satisfactory than placing it on a savings account!

lender.name: Tri2Give
lender.loan_because: We are preparing to race in our very first Ironman triathlon. After a long day of training we always feel so incredibly blessed to be able to participate in a sport that we love. So, it only makes sense to want to help those not as fortunate find their way to a better life.

lender.name: Marjolijn
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping other people. I also like the way Kiva is set up and how you get updates and can see results.

lender.name: The Pink Squirrels
lender.loan_because: We are concerned with the rights and opportunities of women in our community and throughout the world. We believe we can improve the lives of others, even if we've never met.
lender.occupational_info: Our organization is a small group of young women that raises money for specific causes. We host community events to bring people together and try to create fun happenings in our town.

lender.name: inge
lender.loan_because: I want to help other woman in the world.
lender.occupational_info: i ame a houswive and i haf a little handicap so i cant work bad der is my dog i walk with her se is my vriend.

lender.name: Marleen
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to make a better world!
lender.occupational_info: Photographer

lender.name: Fam. Stou
lender.loan_because: "You must be the change you want to see in the world" - Gandhi

lender.name: Nanda
lender.loan_because: This is a very direct way to help people, you see where your money goes

lender.name: Leslia
lender.loan_because: I want to help others!

lender.name: Mary Anne
lender.loan_because: I learned about kiva.org through PBS and also from the recent Oprah show with President Clinton and the founders of kiva.org. What a fantastic, simple idea.
lender.occupational_info: I help to run an international research group involved in sustainable development. We collaborate with people from around the world.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: a small amount of money for me can do quite a lot for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I study political science at AUC

lender.name: Geoff
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach teenagers how to love all kinds of history, not just American history.

lender.name: bart
lender.loan_because: sharing is much better then having
lender.occupational_info: Technicalrodeo on airport equipment at Schiphol

lender.name: Bobbi
lender.loan_because: ... because I love.
lender.occupational_info: I work with flowers, enjoy photography, appreciate nature.

lender.name: Rinus
lender.loan_because: I just want to help other people make a living
lender.occupational_info: we run many internet sites and make a living with advertisements on our websites

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: It puts my money to good use.

lender.name: John & Melinda
lender.loan_because: We've been blessed and want to share with others. We really admire the creativity of these opportunities for us to provide a loan to hard-working people. It's exciting to see a loan repaid, which means the business is likely thriving.
lender.occupational_info: John works for a company and manages the money that they bring in, making sure people are paying for the company's services. Melinda works for a web site to help make the site easy for people to use.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want people to suceed in whatever they want accomplish in their lives

lender.name: Jill & Erik
lender.loan_because: We believe that nobody deserves to live in poverty. By helping others build their business from the ground up we're actively helping, if even in a small way, to end global poverty.

lender.name: Vince and Anna
lender.loan_because: This is how we know what love is: Jesus Christ laid down his life for us. And we ought to lay down our lives for our brothers. If anyone has material possessions and sees his brother in need but has no pity on him, how can the love of God be in him? Dear children, let us not love with words or tongue but with actions and in truth. This then is how we know that we belong to the truth, and how we set our hearts at rest in his presence whenever our hearts condemn us. For God is greater than our hearts, and he knows everything.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I plan meetings and conferences for a non-profit association; edit the newsletter; and manage the website.

lender.name: skip edwards
lender.loan_because: I enjoy making the world smaller and for people to know others care.

lender.name: Jo Smits
lender.loan_because: I believe it will help the people to start with a negociation and create a stronger basis for the future.
lender.occupational_info: I design and create computer programs

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: I believe entrepreneurship is the key to building a better future for the entrepreneur, those they employ, and all their families. I have great respect for these hardworking people who just need a little help.
lender.occupational_info: I have started my business to provide systems that use the sun to produce electricity or hot water.

lender.name: Sydney
lender.loan_because: its better for my money to go to use then for me to use it on something I don't need. I have also been to Costa Rica to work in an orphanage and have seen how much people in need appreciate the smallest things they are given.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a Social Work student at Christopher Newport University.

lender.name: Maura
lender.loan_because: I live in an area where people have so much, so I'd like to help people in areas that are struggling.
lender.occupational_info: I work with attorneys in a corporation, supporting them to make sure we protect our company and are compliant with the law.

lender.name: Monique
lender.loan_because: I like to help others pursuing to make their own future.
lender.occupational_info: I love to share the power of love in many different ways. I share the Quantumtouch with everyone who might need it, and love to share love in this way as well.

lender.name: Vesta
lender.loan_because: I love to give to others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired educator and a tutor.

lender.name: Steve
lender.occupational_info: An independent worker, transporting medicine and medical supplies for the elderly.

lender.name: USA SUNRISE ROTARY
lender.loan_because: We in the USA have so much and Kiva gives us a great way to make a positive impact in the lives of others through small loans to individuals. I like that this is is not a hand out but a hand up!
lender.occupational_info: Rotary is an international organization of business & professional persons united worldwide, who provide humanitarian service, and help build goodwill and peace in the world.

lender.name: NYA Kiva Club
lender.loan_because: we're bleeding-heart capitalists.
lender.occupational_info: We are a high school club interested in helping people around the world.

lender.name: Jolene
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: When someone buys a gift they bring it to me and I wrap it up in beautiful paper, ribbons, and bows.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: A friend introduced me.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I feel it's a humane thing to do - to utilize my privilidged existance in order to assist others not so fortunate; especially when it's clear there is so much effort being made with so little means.
lender.occupational_info: I am employed in a foriegn branch of a corporate bank as an internal controller which means control of other departmental banking transactions.

lender.name: www.babybug.nl
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to give back!

lender.name: Pamela
lender.occupation: Real estate due diligence. Sr. vice president

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed to be able to live the life I lead and I would like to share these blessings. . . . God bless!!

lender.name: Sandi
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I am a prolbem solver.

lender.name: Gampoo and Mrs. Yak
lender.loan_because: Ownership is a fallacy that leads to suffering-at best, one only rents for a bit, a steward of sorts-and if it ain't ours then lets give it out till the well runs dry-or maybe more eloquently-Sharing is our mandate-hording our downfall.
lender.occupational_info: Difficult-sometimes hazardous-but overall a satisfying way to tumble through this world

lender.name: CC.
lender.occupational_info: ---Well, Hello There :)

lender.name: zac
lender.loan_because: I want to help out.

lender.name: miranda
lender.loan_because: i will like to give other people the chance to make a better living for themselve and for their children.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a mother of 2 boys, 9 and 2 years old. I work parttime in a hospital as a nurse.

lender.name: Lenders at 5AM
lender.loan_because: It is one way we can share the opportunities we have been fortunate enough to receive.
lender.occupational_info: We develop custom software that helps researchers and clinicians be more productive in their roles.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I want to help...this loan is also from my parents, Dave and Jean, who met and got married in Turkey 40+ years ago. They're two of the most generous people I know.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place for everyoneand I think it is our duty to give more, if you have more to give.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: Even little bits can help

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: Because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for the risk management of data systems and infrastructure.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: Imagine what can be done when many of us lend a little. Lives could change....

lender.name: SUZIE
lender.loan_because: I RECEIVED BILL CLINTON"S BOOK ON GIVING, AND A KIVA GIFT CERTIFICATE FOR MY BIRTHDAY.
lender.occupational_info: IN THIS STAGE OF MY LIFE, I AM LOOKING TOWARDS ENJOYING MY FAMILY. SINCE I HAVE BEEN SO FORTUNATE, I WANT TO HELP OTHERS IN THE WORLD COMMUNITY

lender.name: Scott and Kylee
lender.loan_because: It's hard to find a place where fewer dollars can do more good.

lender.name: enrique
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves an opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I assist clients with the sale or purchase of Real Estate.

lender.name: Marc & Jacqui
lender.loan_because: May we together make a difference

lender.name: Lilia
lender.loan_because: if a small effort on my behalf can make such a big difference to someone else, how could I not?
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers, designing screens that will help people use them easily.

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because: Because I can and it helps others

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I think the way to a better world is through helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I write magazine articles about technology.

lender.name: jhony
lender.loan_because: yo quiero acceder a los prestamos de kiva para mejorar mi situacion de vida para endependisarme en mi trabajo

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: it gives me that great warm fuzzy feeling inside. Also because I have been so blessed that I want to help others be able to achieve their goals and dreams!
lender.occupational_info: I currently help people with there insurance needs, But in the future I'd really like to start my own event planning company one day!

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: I know how transformative it is to have someone believe in and support your efforts to do something new, beyond what you've done before. I want to do that for someone else. FROM HER FATHER: My daughter Terry passed away 30 July 2009 from a very aggressive metastatic cancer after being ill for less than one month. I will continue her wish to help others by continuing to make loans thru Kiva.

They are also sometimes responsible for typesetting, illustration and web design.

YO SOY UNA PERSONA QUE TIENE UNO DE ESTOS NEGOCIOS Y QUIERO EXPANDIRLO MAS ,SE TRATA DE UN MINI MARQUERT O TIENDA DE BARRIO Y QUISIERA QUE USTDES ME TUVIERAN EN CUENTA PARA UN CREDITO, MI NEGOCIO ESTA UBICADO EN COLOMBIA DEPARTAMENTO DE NARIÑO - IPIALES DONDE LOS CREDITOS SON DIFICILES DE CONSEGIR YA QUE EN LOS BANCOS PIDEN MUCHO GARANTIA Y NO HAY POSIBILIDADES POR ESO ME DIRIGO A USTEDES PARA QUE SE ME TENGA EN CONSIDERACION. EL CREDITO QUE NECESITO DE USTEDES ES DE UN MONTO DE 2.500 DOLARES,PARA EXPANDIR MI TIENDA PUES DE ELLA DEPENDEN MI FAMILIA Y YO, PARA CUALQUIER INQUIETUD O DUDA FAVOR COMUNICARSE CONMIGO AL CELULAR 317 3519124 YA UQE UN TELEFONO FIJO NO TENGO TAMBIEN COLOCO MI DIRRECION QUE ES MANZANA A CASA Nº8 URBANIZACION GARCIA HERREROS IPIALES -NARIÑO. GRACIAS POR TERNER EN CUENTA A LOS POBRES DE SURAMERICA QUE TANTO LO NECESITAN GRACIAS.

lender.name: Wendy Salpeter
lender.loan_because: This is one of my own personal charity choices. Kiva is a non-profit organization doing micro-financing for people in need all over the world. I like to give back where I can. I am so proud, I have had no one default on paying me back !
lender.occupational_info: I am a Mortgage Loan Originator in the USA and Broker doing discounted low rate loans for homes in the USA. Just mention Kiva ! Kiva credits are available at closing. Changing the world one loan at a time !

lender.name: brian
lender.loan_because: To give others opportunity and hope for something better for themselves.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I think it is a great way to help people help themselves. I love it!
lender.occupational_info: I teach 12, 15, and 18 year old students history lessons. I am especially interested in sustainable growth and helping students understand the coming challenges of the 21st century as demand for fossil fuels outstrips supply. Kiva is one way to help individuals and build the local economies that will be so necessary in the futre. I'm also interested in sustainable agriculture and hope to spread management intensive grazing. In my free time, I work as a real estate agent and try to educate people about sustainable communities and lifestyles other than the sprawl so rampant in the U.S. today.

lender.name: Jeff & Megan
lender.loan_because: Direct lending is awesome!
lender.occupational_info: I help run a public middle school for children ages 11-14.

lender.name: Sari
lender.loan_because: I love to help people but I'm a student so I don't have much money to give. This is a great apportunity to help a little and they'll get a lot with there own business.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student and after that I want to work in a daycare for children.

lender.name: Layla & Kamran
lender.loan_because: I have realized by living outside of the US that not everyone has the equality of opportunity that we take for granted at home.
lender.occupational_info: I produce investment reports and sell advertising in them.

lender.name: Glen
lender.loan_because: people can be empowered to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I help identify risk within a business

lender.name: 4liberty

lender.occupational_info: Helping people help themselves by connecting them with Support Groups for their well being

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: Americans should feel responsible towards World welfare. We have maintained a high quality of life for a long time. It's beyound time that we each care enough to give others a chance to raise themselves up beyound mere survival into a higher quality of living. My grandchild, Maya Ndjarakana's father lives in Botswana. When I look into her eyes I see a world beyound my own. A world in which women are marginalized. I want to help change that fact. By lending financial assistance to woman in business, I can do that. Peace
lender.occupational_info: I photograph events. Festivals, Concerts and individuals.

lender.name: shaikha
lender.loan_because: Because helping others purifies the soul

lender.name: Lance
lender.loan_because: I realize how fortunate I am to be living where I am today. I go to a school that overall is well to do. No one should live in poverty especially when most people I know think nothing of turning the lights on, buying food or paying bills
lender.occupational_info: I am a freshman (9th grade) student at MKA in Montclair New Jersey.

lender.name: Rajesh Deshpande
lender.loan_because: .....we created the problem ... we now have to cure it

lender.name: Scott McDonald
lender.loan_because: I am self-employed as well and I know how much a loan can help to make a difference. Most of the world's problems stem from poverty, so the solution should begin with increasing the middle class.
lender.occupational_info: I work with businesses and their computer and networking needs. I enable businesses to efficiently communicate within their organization and reaching their own clients, and I help them to keep records of their business activities.

lender.occupational_info: We are an AP World History Class, Studying the history of the world from 8,000 BCE to modern day. As we study we try to learn how cross-cultural interaction brings the citizens of the world together, how we impact each other, and why people of the world are the way they are based on the significant events of the world's history.

lender.occupational_info: I'm a high school student studying economics and physics.

lender.name: Patti
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help others make other peoples jobs easier and more productive.

lender.name: Billy

lender.occupational_info: I teach writing and literature, and study American culture: primarily I study literature and film, but also history and philosophy

lender.name: Linda

lender.occupational_info: I work on a computer system for the governnment and help to make it run better.
